description.lang: Control everything in your home with ease, with one-touch commands to turn on components and perform custom activities. You can easily adjust lighting throughout your home to fit any mood, and automatically-programmed functions let you control Monster Central IlluminEssence dimmers and switches anywhere. The included Online Wizard makes setup simple, and with flexible programming, the Revolution can learn and adapt to any of your devices, new or old. Ergonomically-designed with a sturdy grip, intuitive layout, and tactile buttons, its easy to useeven in the dark, with elegant backlighting.
